description: Feed generated roster data into existing sim engine to produce realistic individual player game statistics
goal: Full integration - connect roster generators to sim engine and output per-player stats
requirements: Roster to Sim connection - generated rosters feed into sim engine
Per-player stats output - individual player game statistics
Use existing sim logic - don't rebuild sim engine, just integrate
Support full 53-man roster - all roster positions tracked
out_of_scope: Rebuilding sim engine - don't rewrite core sim logic
constraints: Must use existing roster types (TeamInfo, Player interfaces)
No external APIs - all local processing
